comments:
I imported an EAR application, after importing it I got an error message:
"Multiple operations have reported errors."
The details shows:"An internal error occurred during: "Loading atifact edit for 
project". java.lang.NullPointerException"
I clicked OK.

That is what was written in the .log file:
__________
!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.jobs 4 2 2007-03-23 12:18:03.125
!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Loading artifact edit for project".
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException

ices(WebServicesManager.java:488)

sWithWSDL.run(WebServicesManager.java:896)
       at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)
___________

-  I sterted adding external jar file to the java build path to 2 modules in the application.
-  During building the workspace, I got another error indicating OutOfMemory has occured. and exit out of eclipse.

Hi Raj - look similar to one you already own....

This defect is bloking our testing. Three testers have hit this problem using the product in a different way.
I want this defect to be of a P1 priority. I marked it as blocking.
And I would like to get an outlook of when this is going to be fixed. 

Thanks.

Hi Zina, 

  I tried this out and it did not cause out of memory error.

Cancelling this bug. 
We will go about this problem by increasing our heap size.

Thanks.
Closing since the reporter cancelled it.
